messages.content: There can be no doubt that this election will define our future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A future where we stay part of the EU, and country, thrives as a vibrant member of the EU.
A future where we capitalise on our oil and gas skills and realise our renewables potential.
A future where those who want to work in our schools, NHS and universities are elected by our SNP MP.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the SNP can beat the Tories in Aberdeen South

issues.brexitEurope: The Tories want to drag us out of the EU against our will and leave Aberdeen, and Scotland, at the mercy of Boris Johnson.
issues.economy: A future where we capitalise on our oil and gas skills and realise our renewables potential.
issues.education: A future where those who want to work in our schools, NHS and universities.
issues.health: A future where those who want to work in our schools, NHS and universities.

leaflet.personalStatement: I promise to fight to make this possible.

quotes.text: There can be no doubt that this election will define our future.
